title: Ticket #7397: Negotiator not matching IPv6 startds to dual-stack schedds
description: The negotiator has code to avoid matching a schedd and startd that don't have a common IP protocol version (#6351). For example, it won't match an IPv4-only schedd with an IPv6-only startd. The code also avoids matches when the startd supports only one protocol, which doesn't match the schedd's preferred one. For example, it won't match an IPv6-only startd to a dual-stack schedd that prefers IPv4. This second behavior is wrong.
